data.name: CORE_ERROR_ACCESS_TOKEN
data.value: Invalid service access token.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_ARRAY_EMPTY
data.value: {0} list is empty

data.name: CORE_ERROR_EXPIRED_TOKEN
data.value: Authentication tokne has expired

data.name: CORE_ERROR_FAILED_TO_RETRIEVE_CLIENT_IP
data.value: The server failed to retrieve the client's ip address.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_GENERAL_EXCEPTION
data.value: General error: {0}

data.name: CORE_ERROR_GET_SID_FAILED
data.value: Failed to retrieve the machine SID.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_INVALID_USR_CREDENTIAL
data.value: Authentication failed, please verify interface server credentials are correct.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_JSON_EXTRA_MEMBER
data.value: Invalid request packet. Found unexpected parameter : '{0}' in object '{1}' at line {2} position {3}.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_JSON_MEMBER_TYPE
data.value: Invalid request packet. Failed to convert '{0}' in object '{1}' at line {2} position {3}.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_JSON_MISSING_MEMBER
data.value: Invalid request packet. Missing expected parameter : '{0}' from object '{1}' at line {2} position {3}.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_JSON_SYNTAX
data.value: Invalid request packet. JSON syntax error at line {0} position {1}.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_JSON_UNREGISTERED
data.value: Invalid request packet. Unregistered error.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_PARAMS_VALIDATION
data.value: Incorrect parameters provided for requested operation.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_REG_OPEN
data.value: Error opening windows registry used for Web service.Please verify the installation.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_RMCE_INSTALLATION
data.value: Error getting installation path

data.name: CORE_ERROR_RMC_ALREADY_REGISTERED
data.value: RMC device already configured for IP address {0}. Send parameter forceRegister=true to override this configuration.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_RMC_NOT_FOUND
data.value: RMC appliance not found on server [{0}].

data.name: CORE_ERROR_RMC_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: RMC resource {0} could not be found.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_STARTING_SERVICE
data.value: Failed to start the service. Error: {0}

data.name: CORE_ERROR_STRING_EMPTY
data.value: {0} string is empty

data.name: CORE_ERROR_UNAUTH_ACCESS
data.value: Unauthorized access.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_UNDEFINED
data.value: Unknown internal error occurred. Please verify the log.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_URI_NOT_FOUND
data.value: URI {0} not found.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_WRONG_CONTENT_TYPE
data.value: Unsupported media type. Content-Type request header must be set to application/json.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_X_AUTH_TOKEN
data.value: Authentication failed. Please pass a valid token in the X-Auth-Token header.

data.name: CORE_INFO_SERVICE_STARTED
data.value: Service successfully started at {0}

data.name: CORE_INFO_SERVICE_STOPPED
data.value: Service successfully stopped

data.name: VSS_ERROR_FAILED_TO_CREATE_SNAPSHOT
data.value: Failed to create snapshot

data.name: VSS_ERROR_FAILED_TO_MOUNT_SNAPSHOT
data.value: Failed to mount snapshot with Id {0}

data.name: VSS_ERROR_FAILED_TO_READ_SNAPSHOT_ID
data.value: Failed to read snapshot id

data.name: VSS_ERROR_FAILED_TO_READ_SNAPSHOT_XML
data.value: Failed to read snaphot xml

data.name: VSS_ERROR_FAILED_TO_UNMOUNT_SNAPSHOT
data.value: Failed to unmount snapshot with Id {0}

data.name: RMC_VSS_ACCESS_DENIED
data.value: Access Denied
data.comment: Since the RMC VSS Requester is called from client this error should never been seen: Call customer support.

data.name: RMC_VSS_BAD_PARAMETER
data.value: Parameter error : {0}
data.comment: The message includes details of the parameter and how to rectify the issue.

data.name: RMC_VSS_FAILED_TO_CREATE_MOUNTPOINT
data.value: An error occured when attempting to create the mount point : {0}
data.comment: Check the system for errors as to why the mount point folder could not be created.

data.name: RMC_VSS_HW_PROVIDER_ERROR
data.value: VSS HW Provider reported an error.
data.comment: Check the VSS HW Provider logs as to the cause of the error.

data.name: RMC_VSS_IMPORT_FAILED
data.value: The VSS failed to import the snapshot
data.comment: Check the VSS logs as to the cause of the error.

data.name: RMC_VSS_INTERNAL_ERROR
data.value: Internal Error. Please check VSS Logs
data.comment: Check the VSS logs as to the cause of the error.

data.name: RMC_VSS_INVALID_VOLUME
data.value: The volume is invalid or does not exist : {0}
data.comment: Check that the specifid volume is a valid volume.

data.name: RMC_VSS_MOUNTPOINT_NOT_EMPTY
data.value: The mount point must be empty in order to mount a volume: {0}
data.comment: In order to mount the snapshot to a folder the folder must be empty. If the folder exists check that folder is empty.

data.name: RMC_VSS_NO_SNAPSHOTS_FOUND
data.value: No snapshot sets were found
data.comment: Check that the specified snapshot set exists.

data.name: RMC_VSS_NO_VSS_VOLUMES_ASSOCIATED_WITH_APP
data.value: The application uses a volume that is not specified
data.comment: Ensure all volumes that the application use are included to be snapshotted.

data.name: RMC_VSS_REBOOT_REQUIRED
data.value: The VSS HW Provider encountered an error that requires the user to restart the computer.
data.comment: Restart the system before repeating the operation.

data.name: RMC_VSS_REBOOT_REQUIRED_TO_COMPLETE_UNMOUNT
data.value: The system must be restarted to complete the unmount operation
data.comment: The operating system could not complete the unistallation of one or more of the volumes. Restart the system to complete the unistallation.

data.name: RMC_VSS_SNAPSHOT_IN_PROGRESS
data.value: The creation of a shadow copy is already in progress
data.comment: Wait until the current operation is complete and reinitiate the snapshot.

data.name: RMC_VSS_SNAPSHOT_SET_NOT_FOUND
data.value: The specified snapshot set could not be found
data.comment: Check that the specified snapshot set exists.

data.name: RMC_VSS_SQL_SYSTEM_DATABASE_NOT_INCLUDED
data.value: The SQLSystem Databases were not included in the snapshot set
data.comment: SQL Server maintains a set of system-level databases, system databases, which are essential for the operation of a server instance. Several of the system databases must be backed up after every significant update. Backups of these system databases let you restore and recover the SQL Server system in the event of system failure, such as the loss of a hard disk.

data.name: RMC_VSS_UNMOUNT_FAILED
data.value: An error occured when attempting to unmount the snapshot set.
data.comment: Check the system and VSS logs for a reason why the unmount operation failed.

data.name: RMC_VSS_UNSPECIFIED_VOLUME
data.value: The application uses a volume that is not specified : {0}
data.comment: Ensure all volumes that the application use are included to be snapshotted.

data.name: RMC_VSS_VOLUME_NOT_USED
data.value: The volume is not used by the application : {0}
data.comment: Ensure that only volumes used by the application use are included to be snapshotted.

data.name: RMC_VSS_WRITER_STATE
data.value: The VSS Writer is in an error state {0}
data.comment: Check the state of the VSS Writer using, for example, vssadmin.exe.

data.name: RMC_VSS_NO_VSS_COMPONENTS_FOUND
data.value: No VSS Components could be found for the specified application
data.comment: Check that the application details are correct.

data.name: RMC_VSS_NO_VSS_WRITER_FOUND
data.value: Could not find the VSS Writer associated with the application
data.comment: Check that the appropriate VSS Writer is installed.

data.name: RMC_VSS_PROVIDER_NOT_REGISTERED
data.value: The "VSS Provider" is not registered.
data.comment: Check that the VSS Provider is installed and is in a healthy state.

data.name: RMC_VSS_MOUNTPOINT_NOT_VALID
data.value: The snapshot mount point is not a directory {0}
data.comment: The specified mount point must be an empty folder. Delete the file and retry mounting.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_TASK_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Failed to retrieve requested task with guid {0}

data.name: CORE_ERROR_DELETE_RUNNING_TASK
data.value: Can't delete the task with guid {0}, because it is still running

data.name: CORE_ERROR_TASK_RESULT_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Failed to retrieve requested task result with guid {0}

data.name: RMC_VSS_DISK_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Could not find one ore more disks with specified WWNs
data.comment: Check that the WWNs are correct.

data.name: RMC_VSS_VOLUME_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Could not find one ore more volumes with specified WWNs
data.comment: Check that the WWNs are correct.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_TASK_UNEXPECTED_ERROR
data.value: The task with guid {0} has thrown an unexpected error

data.name: RMC_EXCHANGE_VERSION_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Failed to retrieve the exchange version, maybe it is not installed.

data.name: VSS_ERROR_RELEASE_VOLUMES_FAILED
data.value: Failed to release volumes with Ids {0}
data.comment: Couldn't release the given volumes (wwns)

data.name: CORE_ERROR_FAILED_TO_RETURN_FILE
data.value: Failed to return the reporting file, couldn't read it.

data.name: CORE_ERROR_FAILED_TO_ZIP_REPORT
data.value: Failed to zip the report.

data.value: Failed to provide a log path

data.name: FCR_EMPTY_LOG_PREFIX
data.value: Failed to provide a log prefix

data.value: Failed to provide a mailbox database GUID

data.name: FCR_EMPTY_MDB_PATH
data.value: Failed to provide a mailbox database file path

data.name: FCR_EMPTY_RESTORE_LEVEL
data.value: Failed to provide a restore level

data.name: FCR_EMPTY_SUPPLEMENTAL_LOG_PATH
data.value: Failed to provide a supplement log file path

data.name: FCR_INVALID_RESTORE_LEVEL
data.value: Provide restore level value was invalid

data.name: RMC_EXCHANGE_MAILBOX_DATABASE_ACTIVE
data.value: Cannot complete request on an active database copy

data.name: RMC_EXCHANGE_MAILBOX_DATABASE_NOT_IN_DAG
data.value: Database is not part of an availability group

data.name: RMC_EXCHANGE_MAILBOX_DATABASE_GUID_NOT_PROVIDED
data.value: Did not provide mailbox database GUID

data.name: RMC_EXCHANGE_REQUEST_FORMAT_INVALID
data.value: Request body missing top level object

data.name: RMC_EXCHANGE_MAILBOX_DATABASE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: Could not find Exchange mailbox database on local server

data.name: RMC_EXCHANGE_MAILBOX_DATABASE_OPERATION_FAILED
data.value: Operation on Exchange mailbox database failed

data.name: RMC_VSS_HARDWARE_RESCAN_FAILED
data.value: Failed to scan for new hardware

data.name: RMC_EMS_ERROR_COULD_NOT_OPEN
data.value: Failed to open Exchange management shell session

data.name: RMC_VSS_RESCAN_TIMEOUT
data.value: Timed out whilst polling for hardware change

data.name: RMC_VSS_FAILED_TO_OFFLINE_VOLUME
data.value: Failed to bring one or more partitions offline

data.name: RMC_VSS_FAILED_TO_ONLINE_VOLUME
data.value: Faile to braing one or more partitions online

data.name: RMC_POWERSHELL_ERROR
data.value: Encountered error when trying to run Powershell command

data.value: Failed to provide an iSCSI target ID

data.value: Failed to provide an iSCSItarget name

data.value: Failed to provide an iSCSI WWN

data.value: Target not found
